entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @BrianKempGA What lives do you value? The school children you've done nothing to protect? The "essential workers" who barely make a liveable wage yet forced to work under threat of a COVID19 diagnosis? The thousands of citizens waiting hours to vote during a pandemic? Please, enlighten me.
